channel.title: Kristin Berry's GIS Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content on Kristin Berry's GIS Portfolio

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m Kristin Berry, a scientific software professional with some experience in GIS. I’m worked on projects ranging from small websites created to customer specifications to large image-processing software systesm with 15+ years of active development, and have an academic background in Physics and Earth, Atmospheric, and Plantary Sciences. I always enjoy learning new things and am always interested in new connections and oppurtunities. This site showcases primarily GIS projects created as part of the UWF GIS Certificate Program.

item.title: Contact
item.description: You can contact me by using the form below. Your Name Email Address An email address is required. Message
